page.title: 02REDWAY CYCLE SYSTEM
page.content: Milton Keynes is almost unique with the Redways,the Redways are Milton Keynes cycle system. You can get all most any where you want using the redways. Before you start going places on the redways you need a map. There are a lot of sport fields and most of them have redways running through them. Most schools have a redway by them so you can cycle to school. One of the best things about redways is they have bridges or an underpass across the main roads. One of the worse things is there are a lot of hills to climb,some of the steeper hills you have to walk your bike up. I like the redways because where I use to live i had to cycle on the roads,which was not very nice because of the danger of an accident which made it difficult to go on a relaxing ride.
